metadata.feature_description: Insert emojis in posts and comments using emoji panel

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Stream and click on post creation area
steps.expected: Post editor should expand and show emoji button
steps.actual: Post editor expanded with emoji button visible (.actStr_addEmoji)

steps.action: Click emoji button to open emoji panel
steps.expected: Emoji panel should open showing available emojis
steps.actual: Emoji panel opened displaying People category emojis including smiley faces

steps.action: Select a smiley face emoji and type test message
steps.expected: Emoji should be inserted into the post editor
steps.actual: Emoji inserted successfully - editor shows 'Testing emoji insertion:' with grinning face emoji

steps.expected: Post should appear in Activity Stream with emoji displayed correctly
steps.actual: Post submitted and displayed in feed showing the emoji as an image sprite (emojione format)

steps.action: Open emoji panel and select thumbs up emoji
steps.expected: Thumbs up emoji should be inserted into editor

steps.action: Select party popper and heart emojis from different categories
steps.expected: Multiple emojis should appear in the editor
steps.actual: Multiple emojis visible in editor: thumbs up, party popper, and heart emojis displayed correctly

steps.expected: Post should display all emojis correctly in the feed
steps.actual: Post 'Multiple emojis test:' with all three emojis displayed correctly in Activity Stream

steps.action: Click on comment area of an existing post
steps.expected: Comment input field should become active
steps.actual: Comment area expanded showing input field and emoji button

steps.action: Open emoji panel and insert sparkles emoji in comment
steps.expected: Emoji should be inserted into comment field
steps.actual: Sparkles emoji inserted successfully - comment shows 'Comment with emoji:' followed by sparkles

steps.expected: Comment should appear under the post with emoji displayed
steps.actual: Comment posted successfully showing the sparkles emoji rendered as emojione sprite image

steps.action: Open emoji panel and observe default category (People)
steps.expected: Emoji panel should show People category emojis
steps.actual: Emoji panel opened with People category selected by default, showing smiley face emojis

steps.expected: Panel should switch to show celebration emojis
steps.actual: Celebration category displayed showing ribbon, gift, birthday cake, and party emojis

steps.expected: Panel should switch to show food emojis
steps.actual: Food category displayed showing tomato, eggplant, corn, sweet potato, pepper, and grapes emojis

observations: Search for emoji functionality: Code review of dnn.activityStreamUtils.js shows NO emoji search feature implemented. The emoji panel only supports category-based browsing, not text-based search. This test scenario cannot be executed as no UI exists.

Disable emoji panel in settings: The Settings.ascx file does not contain a specific setting to disable the emoji panel. Emoji functionality appears to be controlled at a host-level or is always enabled when the editor is enabled.
Verify emoji display across browsers: Single browser (Chromium via Playwright) testing only - cross-browser verification not performed in this automated test session.
Emojis are rendered using emojione library with PNG sprite sheets (emojione.imageType = 'png', emojione.sprites = true).
ASCII emoji conversion is enabled (emojione.ascii = true) allowing text shortcuts like :) to convert to emoji images.
